alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 25 at 9:51PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Halstad affecting Norman and Traill Counties. .Moderate flooding remains anticipated on the Red River along Halstad. Crest is anticipated to be late this week. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Halstad. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 31.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 PM CDT Monday was 31.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 32.5 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
